item.title: How does branches work in git
item.description: Branches in git is divided into 2 kind. Remote and local. I will demonstrate a basic scenario in this post regarding the local branch. local branch Scenario You are working on your own branch while there is an issue shown up on production branch which need you to do a hotfix. Here is what you need to do. switch to production branch create a issue branch and switch to it which allow you to start working on it and do some commits.
